name: b1_A
question_english: b1.  May people in the same clan marry?
question_malagasy: b1.  … laha mifanambaly gn’olo raza raike?

name: b2_A
question_english: b2.  May cross-cousins marry? (first cousins not in the patrilineal clan).
question_malagasy: b2.  … gn’olo manambaly gny foe’dreny (zokin’dreny sa zain-dreny)?

name: b3_A
question_english: b3.  May a man neglect to do soronanake (rites of filiation)?
question_malagasy: b3.  … laha johary raiky tsy manao sononanake e?

name: b4_A
question_english: b4.  May a man marry a woman who is the age of his mother?
question_malagasy: b4.  … laha johary raiky manambaly gn’olo sevake mitovy tao amin’dreniny?

name: b5_A
question_english: b5.  Can you make an offering to the ancestors of goat ovy or lojy beans if you do not have a cow?
question_malagasy: b5.  … laha gn’olo misono gny razany amin gny bengy ovy lojy laha tsy manan’aombe?

name: b6_A
question_english: b6.  May a woman have multiple husbands?
question_malagasy: b6.  … gny sevake manambaly lehilahy maro?

name: b7_A
question_english: b7.  May small children have play sex so long as the girl does not become pregnant?
question_malagasy: b7.  … laha aja kelikely samy mifandranto laha ohatse ka tsy amin’troke gny aja ampela igny?

name: b8_A
question_english: b8.  May a man neglect to pay brideprice?
question_malagasy: b8.  … laha olo raike zay laha tsy manao sori-baly?

name: b9_A
question_english: b9.  May a woman earn more money than a man?
question_malagasy: b9.  … laha gny sevake mahazo drala maro noho gny valiny?

name: b10_A
question_english: b10.  May a man weave a mat?
question_malagasy: b10. … gny johary laha mandrary tihy?

name: b11_A
question_english: b11.  Would you be sad if one of your daughters became a sarilahy (biological girl who dresses like and acts like a boy)?
question_malagasy: b11.  … laha raike amin’anakao sevake reo sarilahy?

name: b13_A
question_english: b13.  is not normal or not normal for boys and girls to bathe together?
question_malagasy: b13… mety miharo fandroa va gny johary ndrake ampela?

name: c1_A
question_english: c1.  Which has larger tubers on average (A) ovy latahy [the male plant] or (B) ovy somory (the female plant)?
question_malagasy: c1.  Ino gny bevata (A) ovy latahy sa (B) ovy somory?

name: c2_A
question_english: c2. When you dig ovy which is easier (A) to dig a virgin patch or (B) to dig a previously harvested patch (ovy amparahale)?
question_malagasy: c2.  Laha mihaly ovy iha aia gny mora (A) mihaly ovy amin tany mbo tsy nihalian’olo ovy sa (B) mihaly ovy amparahale (tany fa fanialia ovy)?

name: c3_A
question_english: c3.  Put these parts of an ovy plant into the correct order:  “firambony” “toalany” “lohany.”
question_malagasy: c3. Alaharo gny filaharan’gny ovy: Ambony zizik’ambany:  firambony taolany lohany. (A) Taolany-Firambony-Lohany (B) autre.

name: c5_A
question_english: c5.  During what season do you find lots of fia dosoloha?
question_malagasy: c5.  Anfotoa manao akory ty ahita ty fia dosoloha?
Responses: 0=traditional new years (lohatao); 1=late dry season; 2=rainy season; 3=mid dry season; 4=early dry season; 5=all seasons; 9=don't know; NA=no answer

name: c6_A
question_english: c6.  When your karaza (Masikoro Mikea Vezo) plants maize how many seeds do you normally plant?
question_malagasy: c6. Anareo (Masikoro Mikea or vezo) lafa mamboly tsako firy vihin’tsako anaty lavake raike?

name: c7_A
question_english: c7.  When is the best time to do limbary for vary tivalantao?
question_malagasy: c7. Amin’ny fotoa ino nareo manidrake hilimbary amin’ny vary tivalantao?
Responses: 0=traditional new years (lohatao); 1=late dry season; 2=rainy season; 3=mid dry season; 4=early dry season; 5=all seasons; 9=don't know; NA=no answer

name: c8_A
question_english: c8.  What variety of rice stores best?
question_malagasy: c8.  Ino iaby gny karazam-bary farany soa (manahake vary stock) atao tahiry antragno?

name: c10_A
question_english: c10.  Can you make canoe crossbraces (linga varogna) with katrafay (rosewood)?
question_malagasy: c10. Mety hanaova varogna na linga va gny katrafay?

name: d1_A
question_english: d1.  Do the clients of tromba have particularly good harvests ?
question_malagasy: d1.  Gny olo tahan-tromba va mahavagno fambolea maro noho gny olo tsy tahan-tromba?

name: d2_A
question_english: d2.  Do tromba often make particularly good agriculture decisions ?
question_malagasy: d2.  Matetike va gny tromba magnome tono-hevitse amin’ny velomampo?

name: d3_A
question_english: d3.  Sometimes the raza give foraging advice via sikily.
question_malagasy: d3.  Kindraikindrake va gny raza magnome hevitse hamonjy sikily laha te hahazo tindroke soa.

name: d4_A
question_english: d4.  Sometimes the raza give agricultural advice such as which crops to plant and when by sikily.
question_malagasy: d4.   Kindraikindrake va gny raza magnome hevitse mba hamojea sikily mba ahaiza gny fotoa soa hambolea?

name: d5_A
question_english: d5.  Are you taboo for sheep?
question_malagasy: d5. Faly aondry va iha?

name: d6_A
question_english: d6. Are you taboo for quail?
question_malagasy: d6.  Faly kibo va iha?

name: d7_A
question_english: d7.  Are you taboo for black cattle?
question_malagasy: d7.  Faly aombe mainty va iha?

name: d8_A
question_english: d8.  Are you taboo for chicken?
question_malagasy: d8.  Faly akoho va iha?

name: d9_A
question_english: d9.   Are you taboo for a wild bird called tsiloko?
question_malagasy: d9. Faly tsiloko va?

name: b1_B
question_english: b1.  Would it be normal or strange to you if newlyweds lived with the mother of the bride?
question_malagasy: b1 … gny mpivaly vao va laha mipetraky amigny renin’ny ampela agny?

name: b2_B
question_english: b2.   Could someone marry their parallel cousin (first cousin in same clan) ?
question_malagasy: b2-… aha mifanambaly gny anakin’gny mpirahalahy ray?

name: b3_B
question_english: b3.  It is rare to pay brideprice with goats ovy or lojy.
question_malagasy: b3 … aha olo raike manao soritse amy bengy ovy na lojy?

name: b4_B
question_english: b4.  Would it be normal or strange for a man to have multiple wives ?
question_malagasy: b4 … gny johary laha manambaly maro?

name: b5_B
question_english: b5.  Is it okay for a man to have a wife who is sariampela (a man who dresses like a woman)?
question_malagasy: b5 … laha misy johary ta hanambaly olo sary ampela?

name: b6_B
question_english: b6.  Would it be strange for a woman to drive an oxcart ?
question_malagasy: b6 … laha gny sevaky manday sarety?

name: b7_B
question_english: b7.  Would it be strange to see a woman who is rich in cattle ?
question_malagasy: b7 … laha misy sevaky manankanagna aomby?

name: b8_B
question_english: b8.  Is it okay for a woman to wear short-shorts ?
question_malagasy: b8 … laha gny anakanao ampela manday kaliso?

name: b13_B
question_english: b13.  If a man neglects rites of filiation the children normally remain in their mother’s clan.
question_malagasy: b12...laha tsy manao soronanake ny johary mety hangalaky gny razany amin-dreniny va ny ajà?

name: c1_B
question_english: c1.  Which has flowers and seeds : ovy latahy(the male ovy plant) or ovy somory (the female plant)?
question_malagasy: c1- Gny ovy latahy sa gny ovy somory va ro mana voany sy folera?

name: c2_B
question_english: c2.  When is the best season to do ovy poadoha?
question_malagasy: c2- Amy fotoa ino gny soa anaova ovy poadoha?
Responses: 0=traditional new years (lohatao); 1=late dry season; 2=rainy season; 3=mid dry season; 4=early dry season; 5=all seasons; 9=don't know; NA=no answer

name: c3_B
question_english: c3.  How long do you need to dry ovy to make pik’ovy (dried ovy)?
question_malagasy: c3- Laha manao pik’ovy atany firy andro vao maiky?

name: c4_B
question_english: c.4.  When people in your karaza plant manioc how long do they leave the tubers in the ground ?
question_malagasy: c4- Laha mamboly balahazo nareo ( Masokoro Mikea Vezo) firy vola vao haly?

name: c5_B
question_english: c5.  When do you do replant rice for vary foasa (dry season rice)?
question_malagasy: c5- Ino gny fotoa soa laha magnetsa vary faosa?
Responses: 0=traditional new years (lohatao); 1=late dry season; 2=rainy season; 3=mid dry season; 4=early dry season; 5=all seasons; 9=don't know; NA=no answer

name: c6_B
question_english: c6.  What variety of rice produces the most grain ?
question_malagasy: c6- Ino gny karazam-bary tena mamoa mare?

name: c7_B
question_english: c7.  What variety of manioc is easiest to peel?
question_malagasy: c7- Ino gny karazam-balahazo mora ofasa?

name: c8_B
question_english: c8. Does the fish called valalantaitse school?
question_malagasy: c8.  Gny fia valalantaitse (A) fia milongo sa (B) tsy fia milongo?

name: c9_B
question_english: c9. Where do you find black-tipped sharks: on the reef or in the large (deep ocean?)
question_malagasy: c9.  Aia gny ahità gny akio mainty lambosy?  (A) andriake ambony sa (B) andrano lalike?

name: c10_B
question_english: c10. What sail position would you use if the wind were from the south and you want to go north?
question_malagasy: c10.  Lafa mandeha avaratse andaka misy tsiokantimo ino mampiasanao matetike?  (A) lay panihy? (B) lay manindry (C). lay manenga (D) lay savejoe? (E) lay fonta
Responses: 0=lay panihy; 1=lay manindry; 2=lay manenga; 3=lay savejoe; 4=lay fonta; 9=don't know; NA=no answer

name: d1_B
question_english: d1.  Are clients of ambiasa more likely to have big harvests than people who are not clients?
question_malagasy: d1- Gny olo taha’ombiasa va mahavokatsy mare noho gny olo tsy tahan’ombiasa?

name: d2_B
question_english: d2.  Are ambiasa more likely to have big harvests than non-ambiasa?
question_malagasy: d2- Gny ombiasa va mahavagno velomam-po?

name: d3_B
question_english: d3.  Do raza give foraging advice in dreams?
question_malagasy: d3- Gny raza va manome torohevitsy amin ‘ny tindroky ?

name: d4_B
question_english: d4.  Do raza give agricultural advice in dreams for example what crops to plant and when?
question_malagasy: d4- Gny raza va manome torohevitsy amy fambolea sy tabiry amin’ny alalan’ny nofy?

name: d5_B
question_english: d5. Are you taboo for pig?
question_malagasy: d5- Faly koso va iha?

name: d6_B
question_english: d6. Are you taboo for goat?
question_malagasy: d6- Faly bengy va iha ?

name: d7_B
question_english: d7. Are you taboo for cow with red colored back?
question_malagasy: d7- Faly aomby vandamena va iha ?

name: d8_B
question_english: d8. Are you taboo for a wild bird called sihotse?
question_malagasy: d8- Faly sihotsy va iha ?

name: d9_B
question_english: d9. Are you taboo for a wild bird called takapala?
question_malagasy: d9- Faly takampaly va iha ?

Responses: c4. Anareo Masikoro lafa mamboly tsako firy vihin’tsako anaty lavake raike?
c5. Amin’ny fotoa ino nareo manidrake hilimbary amin’ny vary tivalantao?
c6.  Ino iaby gny karazam-bary farany soa (manahake vary stock) atao tahiry antragno?
c7.  Ino iagy gny karazam-balahazo farany lava magnome?
